text:
AxonVR | Senior Software Developer | San Luis Obispo, CA | Full-time | ONSITE only | Equity + Benefits

AxonVR is building the future of haptics and we are looking for a senior software developer to join our team.

Interview process includes phone and onsite interviews. All travel will be paid for.

Full job description can be found here: http://axonvr.com/s/Senior-Software-Developer-Job-Descriptio...
